document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Southeast Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of chigger mites (Acariformes: Trombiculidae) of Southeast Asia

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Trombicula (Pentagonella) acuscutellaris : Womersley & Heaslip 1943: 78
, pl. II (5).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type deposition. Possibly in KWI ( Fuller 1952 )
.

Type data. Ex rat, Sumatra , Deli ( Indonesia , North Sumatra Province , Deli Serdang Regency )
.

Hosts. RODENTIA :
Arvicola terrestris , Bandicota bengalensis , B. indica , Golunda ellioti , Microtus arvalis , Mus musculus , M. musculus bactrianus , Ondatra zibethicus , Rattus andamanensis , R. argentiventer , R. losea , R. norvegicus , R. tanezumi , R. rattus
; CARNIVORA :
Herpestes javanicus , Nyctereutes procyonoides
; PRIMATES :
Homo sapiens
; AFROSORICIDA :
Potamogale velox
; CHIROPTERA :
Pteropus vampyrus
; SQUAMATA :
Rhampholeon boulengeri , R. spectrum
; AVES :
Amaurornis phoenicurus chinensis , Ardea purpurea , A. purpurea manilensis , Calidris pugnax , Centropus monachus , C. senegalensis , C. superciliosus , Corvus cornix , Gallinago media , G. stenura , Gallus gallus domesticus , Ixobrychus cinnamomeus , I. eurhythmus , I. minutus , I. sinensis , Laniarius
sp.,
Philentoma pyrhoptera , Quelea quelea , Rallus aquaticus , Sturnus vulgaris
.

Distribution. AFRICA: Cameroon , Central African Republic , Congo, Democratic Republic of the Congo , Mozambique , Rwanda , Tanzania ; ASIA: Azerbaijan, Burma , Ceylon , China , Guam , India , Indonesia , Kazakhstan , Malaysia , Maldive Islands , Philippines , Thailand , Vietnam ; EUROPE: Bulgaria , Hungary , Moldova , Poland , Russia , Spain , Ukraine .

Remarks. The following nomina nuda created by Vercammen-Grandjean for the samples from African countries are also synonyms of
B. acuscutellaris : Blankaartia (Blankaartia) arusha (nomen nudum), B. (B.) cuculidaea (nomen nudum), B. (B.) ixobrychus (nomen nudum), B. (B.) maji (nomen nudum)
, and
B. (B.) rhampholeonis (nomen nudum)
(Stekolnikov 2019).
